data.title: [Arthur Lake residence, 1051 San Vicente, Santa Monica] (18 views)
data.meta_description: Interior views and portraits of Arthur Lake, his wife Patricia Lake (Van Cleve), daughter Marion. Mott no. 1614 refers to Tom Fizdale Inc., North Hollywood, publicity and public relations firm.1992-4586 (1614-1). Detail of victorian style porcelain table lamp. Small hole in wall reveals projection room which is hidden by painting -- 1992-4587 (1614-6). Room features fireplace, inlaid wood panel walls, oval floral painting above mantel, and Mr. and Mrs. Lake posed near chair -- 1992-4588 (1614-7). Room features fireplace, inlaid wood panel walls, oval floral painting above mantel, and Mrs. Lake posed on sofa with Mr. Lake posed near fireplace -- 1992-4589 (1614-8). Room includes tile work fireplace with large mirror above mantle, king size bed with 1/4 canopy, Mrs. Lake sitting on bed -- 1992-4590 (1614-9). Full view of room includes plaid sofa with coffee table, large center window, bar in corner with family and dogs (King Charles spaniels) sitting at counter -- 1992-4591 (1614-10). Corner window with glassware on sills sits behind decorative bar/soda fountain with blender on counter. Family and two dogs in shot -- 1992-4592 (1614-10). Corner window with glassware on sills sits behind decorative bar/soda fountain with blender on counter. Family and two dogs in shot -- 1992-4593 (1614-10A). Corner window with glassware on sills sits behind decorative bar/soda fountain with blender on counter. Family and two dogs in shot --1992-4594 (1614-12). Detail of victorian style porcelain table lamp. Small hole in wall reveals projection room which is hidden by painting -- 1992-4595 (1614-13). Detail view of Arthur Lake loading 16mm film reel onto Bell and Howell Hollywood Master Projector -- 1992-4596 (1614-13). Detail view of Arthur Lake loading 16mm film reel onto Bell and Howell Hollywood Master Projector -- 1992-4597 (1614-14). Half view of dining room table with silver candle holders, lace place mats, and fruitbowl. Arthur Lake in shot holding bowl of ice -- 1992-4598 (1614-14). Half view of dining room table with silver candle holders, lace place mats, and fruitbowl. Arthur Lake in shot holding bowl of ice -- 1992-4599 (1614-15). Half view of dining room table with silver candle holders, lace place mats, and fruitbowl. Arthur Lake in shot sneaking ice from bowl -- 1992-4600 (1614-16). Arthur Lake poses in yard with two dogs -- 1992-4601 (1614-16A). Arthur Lake poses in yard with two dogs -- 1992-4602 (1614-17). Detail view of Arthur Lake having difficulties loading 16mm film into Bell and Howell Hollywood Master Projector -- 1992-4603 (1614-18). Candid portrait of Arthur Lake placing stamp into piggy bank.Santa Monica home of William Alfred Pickering, head of Pickering Lumber Co. Born in 1870 in Buffalo, Missouri, lumber business in Kansas City. Santa Monica house was built in 1928. Died in 1930. Santa Monica house later bought by Arthur Lake.
